channel.title: 317 [PI] General store problem
channel.description:
Hello,
I have a general store problem. When members/anyone try to sell items to the general store it freezes them out, and restarts the server for them.
Here's the error that pops up in the source: http://prntscr.com/uy323
I have never used the general store, but i believe when i was coding new items/commands/quest; or what ever the hell it was, that it caused the error. I simply don't know where the hell i miss-coded, but i do know this, that error did not come with the source. I have a backup source and it's 100% fine and don't have the glitch. I'll make a second pic for you to see. http://prntscr.com/uy4jo
Anyone think you know where i might have miss-codded?
Thanks, Ninja111

item.title: 317 [PI] General store problem
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Try cleaning your ENTIRE shops.cfg
and re-code it, its easy.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [PI] General store problem
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

well… like i said, on my backup source the error isn’t there and all the files are the same.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [PI] General store problem
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

[quote=“Ninja111, post:5, topic:504420”]Lol, I didn’t edit the shops.cfg.
I edited shop-handler, shop-assist, client, server, player, config; and many others and i think i misprinted a script and i can’t loveing find it.
Did you even look at the pictures?? Just tell me which file that the misprint generally should be in and i’ll fix it within 10 seconds.
Its just i stayed up for 6 hours last night trying to find that and i got aggravated.[/quote]

The compile error tells you all of the files that are messed up.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [PI] General store problem

item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

Lol, I didn’t edit the shops.cfg.
I edited shop-handler, shop-assist, client, server, player, config; and many others and i think i misprinted a script and i can’t fucking find it.
Did you even look at the pictures?? Just tell me which file that the misprint generally should be in and i’ll fix it within 10 seconds.
Its just i stayed up for 6 hours last night trying to find that and i got aggravated.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [PI] General store problem
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

when you use a .cfg file use tabs (press the tab key on you keyboard and that will put you a couple of space’s and it also avoiding from errors like what you have)

Read full topic
